name: Popup to Share
author: Miguel Berlanga, Yolanda Jimenez

sections.description:
This plugin shows sharing buttons for Facebook, Twitter, and Google plus in a pop-up. As you know, sharing your content in a social network you will increase the number of visitors of your website. If you want you can send us your comments to help us improve out plugin for following versions.

Popup to Share is completely free. If you want you can collaborate with us by including our link on your website or sending suggestions. You can contact us through the email that appears in the plugin website.

Donations

If you would like to donate to help support, please visit http://codigojavaoracle.com/donations-donacion/

More plugins to share

You can lookup our new plugins Toobar to share, this plugin shows a little toolbar with buttons to Share the contents of your website.
* https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/toolbar-to-share*

On this website you can see more information
* http://codigojavaoracle.com/desarrollo-web/toolbar-to-share-plugin-wordpress/*
sections.installation:
1. Upload the extracted archive to ‘wp-content/plugins/’

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu

  3. Open the plugin settings page Settings -> Popup to Share

  4. Adjust settings
sections.changelog:
Version 1.3

  • Solved a mistake on Facebook absolute url.

Version 1.0

  • Solved a mistake on Twitter acount.
  • Solved a mistake with image.

Version 0.1

  • Plugin Released
  • Let’s Go!!!
